resources.description: The Children in Low-Income Families Local Measure is the proportion of children living in families either in receipt of out-of-work benefits or in receipt of tax credits with a reported income which is less than 60 per cent of national median income.
resources.name: Percentage of children in low income families in Herefordshire 2011- 2013

resources.description: Data in JSON format (useful for developers)
resources.name: Percentage of children in low income families in Herefordshire 2011- 2013

organization.description:
This is the community datastore for Herefordshire. [Here is a post about what the datastore is and why you should care](http://h-map.org.uk/2016/05/06/what-is-the-herefordshire-datastore-and-why-should/).


Part of the [Brightspace Foundation Route Map project](http://h-map.org.uk/).

We blog over at the [Route Map blog](http://h-map.org.uk/category/all-posts/).

If you'd like to add data here, you'll need a datahub.io account. Then [contact the RouteMap project](http://h-map.org.uk/contact-us/).
organization.title: Herefordshire
organization.name: hdata

name: percentage-of-children-in-low-income-families-in-herefordshire-2011-2013
notes:
The Children in Low-Income Families Local Measure is the proportion of children living in families either in receipt of out-of-work benefits or in receipt of tax credits with a reported income which is less than 60 per cent of national median income.
Source: https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/personal-tax-credits-statistics#history
title: Percentage of children in low income families in Herefordshire 2011- 2013
